summary:
Khoraak is based on Master Dan's beautiful character. 
Meet Khoraak! He is a Khajit, raised by Argonians. His family was crossing the frozen plains of Skyrim and were killed. No one knows why. Argonians were traveling through, North of Riften, and found the shivering cub. They accepted the cub into their brood and raised him to be a man. He grew
descriptionHtml:
Meet Khoraak! He is a Khajit, raised by Argonians. His family was crossing the frozen plains of Skyrim and were killed. No one knows why. Argonians were traveling through, North of Riften, and found the shivering cub. They accepted the cub into their brood and raised him to be a man. He grew to be a brave, kind, and honorable person, and very devout in the ways of following the Hist. 

On Khoraak you will find a note from his Argonian family. 
You will find him to be marriable. 
LOCATION:  Drunken Huntsmen Whiterun

***Requirements (possibly)*** 
Ultimate Follower Overhaul (add this follower after the UFO) 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037/? 

Suggestions: 
MAKING HOTTER KHAJITS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941/? 
TERA ARMORS: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27680/? 

FAQ:
If you don't have the "Follow me" option, 
lykanthrus  discovered this console command should help:
player.setrelationshiprank 22000d64 4 
NOTE THE SPACE BETWEEN 22000d64 AND 4

If THAT doesn't work:
1. Press the:  `
2.  Click Khoraak, a number should be shown, make a note of that number
3.  Type
player.setrelationshiprank (Whatever number was shown earlier) 4 

If THAT doesn't work:
Log into Creation Kit
Load Khoraak's data
Go to Relationship
Creation relationship
author: Sarah - Mclinorama
